summary: [color=#FF000]Landscaped Player Homes[/color] is an ongoing series of mods that add landscaping, subdued lighting and other aesthetics to the exteriors of Skyrims\' player homes. All files are optional.  Breezehome is version 2.0, Proudspire is version 2.2, Version 2.4 is Honeyside Available in the downloads section as Optional files.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF000]Landscaped Player Homes[/color] adds some plants, small trees, a few exterior lanterns and other items around Players\' Homes. Generally giving them better appearances.
__________________________________________________________
In case you do not like a particular mod, I have made them independent of each other ( Stand alone Files ) and are named accordingly.
Make sure you\'re downloading the proper file using the Downloads Button.
__________________________________________________________
 Stand alone Breezehome version 2.0, stand alone Proudspire version 2.2 and stand alone Honeyside version 2.4 are available in the downloads section.
__________________________________________________________ 
Endorsements appreciated :)
Ohio Gramps\' other mods:
__ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11749]Hrothgar Sanctuary[/url]
__ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11985]Jordis Room Fix[/url]
__________________________________________________________
Blue roofing and architecture shown in the Whiterun images are from:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8143]Alternatives-Whiterun mod[/url]
( Very nice work by Zayla) *
__________________________________________________________
All file are compatible with the Horrorviews\' Sexy Series and Zaylas\' Alternative series of city mods, Vurts Skyrim Floral Overhaul and the various Green Cities Mods by 120Legacy and ortona92.
__________________________________________________________
author: Ohiogramps

files.name: Landscaped_Homes_Breezehome
files.changelogHtml:
Will be making individual Landscaped versions of player homes instead of combining them.
Added additional Flora around the home.
Per request, added a bench with a mountain view in the back yard.
Have left the Down load with Manager buttons activated and hope that the mod Manager recognizes the files as existing :)
Renamed the esp file to Landscaped_Breezehome, as it was way too long :)

files.name: Landscaped_Homes_Proudspire
files.changelogHtml:
Renamed files to Landscaped_Homes_etc etc If I could have merged files , This would not have been necessary
Landscaped_Homes_Proudspire mod added.
Once again this mod only affects the immediate area around the Homes.
Hanging Plants added to the home.
Candles and lanterns light your way at night.
â€¢A visually enticing Patio with flower boxes and non-light emitting candles and Lanterns added

files.name: Landscaped_Homes_Honeyside
files.changelogHtml:
Added Honeyside in Riften as Version 2.4
Added missing Chimney and smoke to Honeyside.
Added Lighting and Nautical items to the exterior.
Added Chicken Nests to Garden area and set eggs and leeks to propogate.
Numerous Aesthetic exterior improvements added.
